resume.summary: Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer with strong skills in NLP, machine learning, and forecasting. Proven track record in e-commerce analytics, forecasting, and operational optimization.

experience.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant

experience.title: Data Science Intern

experience.title: Business Analyst Intern
experience.description: Developed distributed forecasting models with 5.2% MAPE; automated data pipelines, reducing query time by 70%.

experience.title: Data Engineer Intern
experience.description: Prepared 10GB calligraphy dataset; created ETL pipelines and ensured data quality, reducing errors by 20%.

experience.title: Intern

education.degree: Master of Engineering in Industrial Engineering & Operational Research

story_bank.title: VIP.com Return Classification Success
story_bank.content: Successfully led the integration of DeepSeek RAG zero-shot classifier at VIP.com, achieving human-level accuracy (98%) in predicting return responsibilities using multimodal embeddings and FAISS.

story_bank.title: Amazon Forecasting Optimization
story_bank.content: Engineered a distributed LightGBM forecasting model on AWS SageMaker, significantly improving forecasting accuracy (5.2% MAPE) and database integration for informed demand planning decisions.

story_bank.title: Automated Data Pipeline
story_bank.content: At Amazon, developed an automated AWS EC2 data pipeline, reducing daily reporting query time by 70% and enhancing decision-making efficiency for over 100 stakeholders.

linkedin_messages.title: General Connection
linkedin_messages.template: Hi {{name}}, I noticed your work at {{company}} and was impressed by {{specific_detail}}. I'd love to connect and learn more about your experience in {{industry}}.

connection_emails.title: Mutual Connection Intro
connection_emails.template:
Hi {{name}},

I'm {{your_name}}, currently an MEng IEOR Fung Scholar at Berkeley (Go Bears!), graduating this May. With over 3 years in data science and ML, including roles at Amazon and expertise in Spark, LLM, and NLP, I was excited to find the {{position}} at {{company}}.

I'd greatly appreciate your insights about the team or any advice or referrals you might offer regarding the position. Thanks so much, and have a great day!

Best,
{{your_name}}
LinkedIn

hiring_manager_emails.title: Job Application Follow-up
hiring_manager_emails.template:
Hi {{name}},

I'm {{your_name}}, currently an MEng IEOR Fung Scholar at Berkeley (Go Bears!), graduating this May. I've recently applied for the {{position}} at {{company}} and am particularly excited about this role. My experience with forecasting models at Amazon, NLP teaching, and PySpark-based RAG solutions at VIP.com aligns closely with the job requirements.

I'd greatly appreciate the opportunity to discuss how my skills might fit with your team's needs. Thanks so much for your time.

{{your_name}}
LinkedIn

cover_letters.title: Standard Cover Letter
cover_letters.template:
Hi {{hiring_manager_name}},

I'm {{your_name}}, currently an MEng IEOR Fung Scholar at Berkeley (Go Bears!), graduating this May. With over 3 years of hands-on data science and ML experience, including developing forecasting models at Amazon London and building RAG solutions using PySpark at VIP.com, I'm excited to apply for the {{position}} at {{company}}.

My recent work on multimodal classification achieving 98% accuracy and my research into job categorization using large language models closely align with the analytical rigor and innovation your team emphasizes. My teaching experience in graduate NLP courses further demonstrates my ability to effectively communicate complex solutions.

I'd love the opportunity to discuss further how my background and passion align with your team's objectives at {{company}}. Thank you so much for your consideration.

Best,
{{your_name}}
LinkedIn

generated_content.content:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Machine Learning Engineer, AGIF position at Amazon.com Services LLC. As a soon-to-be graduate from UC Berkeley with a Master's degree in Industrial Engineering & Operational Research, I bring a strong foundation in software development, machine learning techniques, and a track record of successful project delivery.

One of my key achievements was successfully leading the integration of the DeepSeek RAG zero-shot classifier during my internship at VIP.com. This complex project involved utilizing Python, PyTorch, and HuggingFace, along with multimodal embeddings and FAISS. The result was a prediction model with human-level accuracy of 98% for return responsibilities. I believe this experience, coupled with my expertise in software development, aligns well with your requirement for a professional with solid software development and design architecture experience.

Another project I'm particularly proud of was the creation of a distributed LightGBM forecasting model on AWS SageMaker. This model improved forecasting accuracy to a 5.2% MAPE, providing VIP.com with a robust tool for informed demand planning decisions. This project not only honed my skills in working with AWS services but also underlined the value I can bring to Amazon in terms of building, testing, and maintaining key tooling for model evaluation.

As a passionate engineer and scientist, I am excited about the opportunity to work with a team dedicated to pushing the boundaries of innovation. I am particularly drawn to Amazon's commitment to representing the customer perspective through accurate benchmarking and believe that my experiences and passion for machine learning make me a strong candidate for this role.

In closing, I am excited about the prospect of bringing my unique blend of skills and experiences to Amazon.com Services LLC. I am confident that my background in software development, machine learning, and project management will be of great value to your team. I look forward to the possibility of discussing this exciting opportunity further.

Thank you for considering my application.

Best Regards,
Zikai (Kerry) Liu

Dear Hiring Manager,

I'm writing to express my interest in the Unknown Job Title position at Meta. As a soon-to-be graduate of the Master of Engineering in Industrial Engineering & Operational Research program at UC Berkeley, I've honed my analytical skills and developed a deep understanding of data-driven decision making. My experience as a Data Science Intern at VIP.com further showcases my ability to leverage large datasets to solve complex problems and drive product strategy.

At VIP.com, I led the integration of DeepSeek RAG zero-shot classifier, where I used multimodal embeddings and FAISS to achieve an impressive 98% human-level accuracy in predicting return responsibilities. This successful project demonstrates my proficiency in Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, which aligns with the technical expertise your role requires.

I also engineered a distributed LightGBM forecasting model on AWS SageMaker during my tenure at VIP.com. This project significantly improved forecasting accuracy to a 5.2% MAPE, demonstrating my ability to understand ecosystems, user behaviors, and long-term product trends. With my proficiency in SQL and my strong understanding of statistical/mathematical software like R, I am confident in my ability to handle Meta's large and complex datasets.

My interest in Meta extends beyond the role's requirements. I am drawn to Meta's vision of moving beyond 2D screens towards immersive experiences like augmented and virtual reality. I am excited at the prospect of using my skills to contribute to this next evolution in social technology.

In closing, I believe the Unknown Job Title position at Meta is a perfect match for my qualifications. I am excited about the opportunity to apply my skills and experiences to contribute to Meta's mission. I look forward to the possibility of discussing my application with you further.

Thank you for considering my application.

Best Regards,
Zikai (Kerry) Liu

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Data Scientist, Product Analytics position at a Scientist. As a Master of Engineering graduate with a specialization in Industrial Engineering & Operational Research, I'm excited about the opportunity to apply my skills in your dynamic environment. 

My experience as a Data Science Intern at VIP.com has equipped me with a deep understanding of data analytics, as well as the technical skills required for this role. I successfully led the integration of the DeepSeek RAG zero-shot classifier, achieving human-level accuracy (98%) in predicting return responsibilities. This project demanded a keen understanding of data mining and analytical problem-solving. 

Further, my experience in developing a distributed LightGBM forecasting model on AWS SageMaker at VIP.com, which improved accuracy by 5.2%, demonstrates my capacity for using quantitative approaches to understand long-term product trends. This aligns directly with your need for a professional who can identify and measure the success of product efforts through goal setting and monitoring of key product metrics.

In addition to my work experience, I bring a robust technical toolkit. My proficiency in Python, SQL, TensorFlow, and other scripting languages aligns with your job requirements. Moreover, my ability to use these tools to generate actionable insights and drive data-driven projects from definition to execution is a testament to my readiness for this role.

I am drawn to a Scientist because of your commitment to using data to solve complex problems and inform strategy decisions. I am excited about the prospect of working with your cross-functional teams to leverage data in creating innovative solutions. 

In conclusion, I am confident that my strong technical abilities, coupled with my passion for analytics and proven track record, make me a compelling candidate for this role. I am eager to contribute to your team and look forward to the possibility of discussing my application with you further.

Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,
Zikai (Kerry) Liu

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Software Engineer, ML Research position with Codeium. As a Fung Scholar at Berkeley, where I am completing my Master of Engineering in Industrial Engineering & Operational Research, I have honed my skills in machine learning, NLP, and forecasting, making me an excellent fit for this opportunity.

I successfully led the integration of the DeepSeek RAG zero-shot classifier, achieving human-level accuracy of 98% in predicting return responsibilities. Subject: Application for Software Engineer, ML Research Position

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to apply for the position of Software Engineer, ML Research at your esteemed organization. As a prospective Master of Engineering graduate from UC Berkeley with a robust proficiency in machine learning and data science, I am confident that my unique skill set aligns with your requirements.

Throughout my academic and professional journey, I've worked on numerous projects that demonstrate my ability to navigate high levels of uncertainty and prioritize high-value experiments. Best Regards,

Zikai (Kerry) Liu

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Software Engineer, ML Research position, as advertised at your esteemed company. I am an MEng IEOR Fung Scholar at Berkeley, graduating this May, with a strong background in machine learning and a proven track record in e-commerce analytics and operational optimization.

During my tenure as a Data Science Intern at VIP.com, I successfully led the integration of a DeepSeek RAG zero-shot classifier, which achieved 98% accuracy in predicting return responsibilities using multimodal embeddings and FAISS. This project highlighted my ability to navigate high levels of uncertainty, prioritize high-value ML experiments, and transform successful experimental outcomes into robust, scalable features - all of which are key requirements for your position.

In another project, I engineered a distributed LightGBM forecasting model on AWS SageMaker, significantly improving the forecasting accuracy to a 5.2% MAPE. This experience aligns well with your need for someone who can meticulously document findings, conduct ablation studies, and synthesize data into actionable insights. 

My strong software engineering skills are backed by my proficiency in Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, HuggingFace, AWS (SageMaker, EC2, Lambda), Java, C++, CUDA, Docker, SQL, Git, Spark, VBA, Power BI, Julia, and RESTful APIs. I'm confident that this diverse skill set will allow me to contribute significantly to your team.

I am particularly drawn to your company's commitment to delivering the best user experience using cutting-edge language models and custom inference stacks. Also, being deeply interested in the code generation problem, I am excited about the prospect of working in an environment that encourages continuous questioning and re-examination of priors in light of new discoveries.

In conclusion, I am eager to contribute to your team's success and participate in the ML reading group to level up the team's knowledge. If given the opportunity, I am sure that I could bring my strong software engineering skills and passion for machine learning to bear on the challenges and opportunities at your company.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of discussing this exciting opportunity with you.

Sincerely,
Zikai (Kerry) Liu

This resulted in a significant improvement in forecasting accuracy (5.2% MAPE) and a more integrated database for informed planning decisions. I believe this experience aligns with your requirement for a candidate who can navigate high levels of uncertainty, prioritize high-value ML experiments, and demonstrate initiative in starting and driving projects independently.

As a user and admirer of AI-powered tools like Codeium and Copilot, I have deep appreciation and curiosity about the code generation problem. This, coupled with my willingness to constantly re-examine priors in the light of new discoveries, makes me a good fit for your team. I am confident that I can contribute meaningfully to Codeium's mission of delivering the best experience possible to users.

In closing, I am excited about the prospect of joining Codeium and contributing to the cutting-edge work your team is doing. I believe my skills and experiences make me a strong candidate for this role and I look forward to the possibility of discussing my application with you further.

Thank you for considering my application.

Best Regards,
Zikai (Kerry) Liu
